mapper.select: select p.*,CONCAT(d.name,'-',di.name,'-',dis.name) as arean,concat(c.name,'-',co.name) as areans,r.rname from peoples p INNER JOIN districts d on p.idp=d.id INNER JOIN districts di on p.idc=di.id INNER JOIN districts dis on p.idt= dis.id INNER JOIN community c on p.cause=c.id INNER JOIN community co on p.xid=co.id INNER JOIN rescue r on p.cause=r.rid
